meanings.definition: The highest quality or standard of excellence.
meanings.sent1: Her cake had a superquality that made it stand out at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The superquality of the diamond made it sparkle brilliantly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The superquality of his jokes always made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was a superquality that shone through in his work.
meanings.sent5: The superquality of her singing voice left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A characteristic or feature that sets something apart as exceptional.
meanings.sent1: The unique superquality of the painting made it a masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The superquality of his leadership skills made him a great team captain.
meanings.sent3: The superquality of the cat's meow always made her owner smile.
meanings.sent4: The superquality of her kindness was evident in every action she took.
meanings.sent5: The superquality of his storytelling transported the listeners to another world.
